<JD_START>
Job Title: Graphic Designer

Location: Casa Grande, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Maricopa, AZ 

Competitive Pay And Benefits

 The Graphic Designer  will play a pivotal role in enhancing our brand identity and communicating our message effectively to our target audience. You will collaborate closely with the marketing team and other departments to create visually compelling designs that align with our brand guidelines and objectives.

Graphic Designer Responsibilities

 Develop creative concepts, graphics, and layouts for various marketing materials, including brochures, product packaging, advertisements, and digital media.  Design and produce visual content for print and digital platforms, ensuring consistency in branding and messaging.  Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm ideas, storyboard concepts, and contribute innovative solutions to marketing campaigns.  Create visually engaging presentations for internal and external stakeholders, including sales presentations, trade show materials, and corporate communications.  Maintain and update the company's visual assets, including logos, images, and templates, to ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints.  Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design tools, and best practices to continuously improve the quality and effectiveness of our designs.  Manage multiple projects simultaneously and adhere to deadlines while maintaining high standards of quality and accuracy.  Work closely with external vendors, printers, and other suppliers to oversee the production process and ensure the final output meets our specifications. 

Graphic Designer Requirements

 High School Diploma or GED required.  Degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communications, or related field preferred  Proven experience as a graphic designer, preferably in a manufacturing or industrial setting.  Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).  Strong understanding of typography, color theory, layout design, and visual composition.  Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.  Detail-oriented with a keen eye for aesthetics and a passion for creativity.  Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.  Portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design projects, with an emphasis on print and digital media.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
